snippet: At least 20 soldiers were killed in fierce fighting in Afghanistan’s remote northeast corner.
abstract: Afghan forces battle Taliban in Badakhshan Province, Afghanistan, resulting in deaths of at least 20 soldiers, including eight by beheading; government anticipates and prepares for greater challenges from Taliban now that American and International support are scaled back.
lead_paragraph: At least 20 soldiers were killed in fierce fighting in Afghanistan’s remote northeast corner.

headline.main: Afghan Army Is Tested by the Taliban as Fighting Season Begins
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Afghanistan: Soldiers Are Killed in Fighting With the Taliban
